ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will say, 'We were not among those who did salat
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will answer: "We did not fulfil our devotional obligations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will answer: “We were not among those who observed Prayer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will reply, "We did not pray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We never used to offer the prayer.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will say: "We were not of those who used to offer the Salah,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall say: We were not of those who prayed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They shall say, 'We were not of those who prayed, and
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They will answer: We were not of those who prayed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they shall reply, "We were not among those who prayed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will say. 'we have not been of those who prayed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will answer, ‘We were not among those who prayed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will say: "We were not of those who prayed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will say: "We were not of those who used to offer their Salat (prayers)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will reply: 'We were not among those who prayed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will say, “We were not of those who prayed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:43] They will say, ‘We were not of those who prayed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: They will answer) the dwellers of the Fire will answer: (We were not of those who prayed) the five daily prayers, i.e. we were not among the Muslims.
